item.name: Device uptime
item.description: The time since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

trigger.expression: ({Template Ubiquiti - Rocket AC Lite:ifOperStatus.9.last(0)}=2) and ({Template Ubiquiti - Rocket AC Lite:ifAdminStatus.9.last(0)}=1)
trigger.name: Link down on {HOSTNAME} Ath0

trigger.expression: ({Template Ubiquiti - Rocket AC Lite:ifOperStatus.4.last(0)}=2) and ({Template Ubiquiti - Rocket AC Lite:ifAdminStatus.4.last(0)}=1)
trigger.name: Link down on {HOSTNAME} Eth0

trigger.expression: ({Template Ubiquiti - Rocket AC Lite:ifOperStatus.5.last(0)}=2) and ({Template Ubiquiti - Rocket AC Lite:ifAdminStatus.5.last(0)}=1)
trigger.name: Link down on {HOSTNAME} Eth1
